xdi2.core.security.digest.create

Interface MDDigestCreator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DigestCreator<MDDigest>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMDDigestCreator, MDBasicDigestCreator

    public interface MDDigestCreator
extends DigestCreator<MDDigest>
    This is a DigestCreator that can create an XDI MDDigest.
